markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Toothwort Extract](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1662)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Additive 1" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=4" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Travel Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=141) pg. 101</row>

**Price** 9 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row> </row></row>

 

**Trigger** You use [Quick Alchemy](/Actions.aspx?ID=2) to craft an alchemical poison that's at least 1 level lower than your advanced alchemy level.

 
</row>

</column>

---

Originally used in dental procedures, toothwort numbs the gums by deadening nerves. When the oils are extracted and distilled, toothwort has a secondary reputation among alchemists for enhancing the duration of poisons. When adding toothwort extract to an [alchemical poison](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-poisons), you can extend the maximum duration of the poison by 1 round.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Toothwort Extract
